indications: Hemoptysis, rectal bleeding, intestinal bleeding, hemorrhoidal bleeding and hematuria

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood circulation and expands the chest to regulate Lung Qi
Regulates menstruation, reinforces the sperm, promotes urination and reinforces the Heart

contraindications: Use with caution for those with Cold and Deficiencies.

useCases: Rectal bleeding, intestinal bleeding or hemorrhoidal bleeding
Sprain and strain of the back

notes: Some sources say that this herb has a hypotensive action.
